functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.content: What are the running times in minutes of the five most recent Indian Academy Award winners and nominees?
What are the running times in minutes of the five most recent Indian Academy Award winners and nominees?

function.name: search
function.arguments: {"query":"List of Indian Academy Award winners and nominees"}

function.name: search
function.arguments: {"query":"List of Indian Academy Award winners and nominees"}

msg.content:
No page with that title exists. Try searching for one of these similar articles instead:
- List of Indian winners and nominees of the Academy Awards
- List of British Academy Award nominees and winners
- List of Indian winners and nominees of the Grammy Awards
- List of German Academy Award winners and nominees
- List of Academy Award winners and nominees of Asian descent
- List of Canadian Academy Award winners and nominees
- List of Indian Golden Globe Award winners and nominees
- List of Grammy Award winners and nominees by country
- List of Muslim Academy Award winners and nominees
- List of Indian winners and nominees at the Cannes Film Festival
